phrases.original: Ask the recipient to scan this barcode. This will open the invite in their Web browser.
phrases.translated: Ask the recipient to scan this barcode. This will open the invite in their Web browser.

phrases.original: Have the recipient open the camera app on their cell phone, then point it at this barcode (without taking a picture). A prompt should appear on their screen. By clicking a link in that prompt, the invite will open in their Web browser. (If this doesn't work, have them scan the barcode with a QR Code app).
phrases.translated: Have the recipient open the camera app on their cell phone, then point it at this barcode (without taking a picture). A prompt should appear on their screen. By clicking a link in that prompt, the invite will open in their Web browser. (If this doesn't work, have them scan the barcode with a QR Code app).

phrases.original: Tag invite with my current location
phrases.translated: Tag invite with my current location

phrases.original: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to follow up.
phrases.translated: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to follow up.

phrases.original: This invite has been saved to your account.
phrases.translated: This invite has been saved to your account.

phrases.original: This invite has been saved to your account.
phrases.translated: This invite has been saved to your account.

phrases.original: In case you had any problems sending,
phrases.translated: In case you had any problems sending,

phrases.original: click Retry, and maybe consider using another sending method.
phrases.translated: click Retry, and maybe consider using another sending method.

phrases.original: In case there were any problems with scanning,
phrases.translated: In case there were any problems with scanning,

phrases.original: click Retry, and maybe consider using another sending method.
phrases.translated: click Retry, and maybe consider using another sending method.

phrases.original: Please input the recipient's mobile phone number.
phrases.translated: Please input the recipient's mobile phone number.

phrases.original: Please check the recipient's mobile phone number for accuracy.
phrases.translated: Please check the recipient's mobile phone number for accuracy.

phrases.original: Please input the recipient's e-mail address.
phrases.translated: Please input the recipient's e-mail address.

phrases.original: Please check the recipient's e-mail address for accuracy.
phrases.translated: Please check the recipient's e-mail address for accuracy.

phrases.original: Name will be displayed on recipient's invite
phrases.translated: Name will be displayed on recipient's invite

phrases.original: You will be notified when the recipient has clicked on and viewed the invite.
phrases.translated: You will be notified when the recipient has clicked on and viewed the invite.

phrases.original: You have disabled all notifications, so you won't be notified when this recipient has viewed the invite. But you can reenable notifications at any time, in your Settings.
phrases.translated: You have disabled all notifications, so you won't be notified when this recipient has viewed the invite. But you can reenable notifications at any time, in your Settings.
